alert.note: Alert for Custer; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 10 at 10:53PM MDT until May 10 at 11:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM MDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CUSTER AND SOUTHWESTERN PENNINGTON COUNTIES... At 1052 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Folsom to 4 miles southwest of Hermosa to 4 miles southwest of Custer, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Custer, Hermosa, Hayward, Crazy Horse Memorial, Custer State Park, Sylvan Lake, Keystone, Keystone Wye, Hill City, Rockerville, Bear Country, Medicine Mountain, Bear Mountain Lookout, Reptile Gardens, Hart Ranch and Black Gap. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
